articles.title: Vancouver miner Fortuna Silver has second fatality in South America since last year
articles.description: Fortuna Silver reports death at mine in Peru, following death in Argentina in January
articles.content:
Fortuna Silver reports death at mine in Peru, following death in Argentina in January
Vancouver’s Fortuna Silver Mines Inc. (TSX :FVI, NYSE :FSM) has experienced a second fatality at one of its South American mines in less than two years.

articles.title: Messi’s father says player ‘would like to return’ to Barcelona amid speculation over Saudi move
articles.description: Barcelona has continued to restructure its finances to make sure it can afford Lionel Messi’s return in case the Argentina star decides to come back to the Spanish league after his stint with PSG
articles.content:

articles.title: Alexis Mac Allister: Liverpool hopeful of signing Brighton and Argentina midfielder
articles.description: Liverpool have been in contact with Brighton regarding the signing of Alexis Mac Allister, who has a release clause of between £45-55m in his contract; Jurgen Klopp keen to revamp midfield following departures of James Milner, Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain, Naby Keita and Arthur Melo
articles.content:
Liverpool are hopeful of signing Brighton midfielder Alexis Mac Allister this week.
The two Premier League clubs have been in contact regarding the Argentine World Cup winner, who has a release clause of between £45m and £55m in his contract.

articles.title: Alexis Mac Allister to Liverpool: Jurgen Klopp's midfield rebuild helped by his qualities with and without the ball
articles.description: Find out why Argentina international Alexis Mac Allister could be the man to help Liverpools midfield rebuild with his combination of passing skills and pressing ability
articles.content:
Liverpool’s midfield has been scrutinised for some time, seen as the root cause of their decline. Overhauling it offers a route out of their problems. The acquisition of Alexis Mac Allister could prove to be a significant moment for Jurgen Klopp.

articles.title: Argentina's Messi keen on rejoining Barcelona, says father
articles.description: Lionel Messi, who last week played his last game for Paris St Germain, is open to making a return to LaLiga side Barcelona, the Argentine forward's father said on Monday.
articles.content:
June 5 (Reuters) - Lionel Messi, who last week played his last game for Paris St Germain, is open to making a return to LaLiga side Barcelona, the Argentine forward's father said on Monday.

articles.title: Uruguay, South Korea reach Under-20 World Cup semifinal; USA and Nigeria out
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Uruguay and South Korea advanced to the semifinals of the Under-20 World Cup on Sunday.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Uruguay and South Korea advanced to the semifinals of the Under-20 World Cup on Sunday.
The South Americans beat the United States 2-0 in Santiago del Estero, dominating the match from start to finish. The Asian team, r... [739 chars]

articles.title: Argentina: River Plate football game suspended after fan dies in 15-metre fall from stadium
articles.description: The home club, Argentinian giants River Plate, has decreed a day of mourning as investigations get under way into how the man came to die at the game.
articles.content:
A football game in Argentina had to be suspended after a supporter fell from the stadium.
The fan, reportedly aged in his 50s, jumped and "died on the spot", said a statement from club River Plate, which had been playing rivals Defensa y Justicia at ... [1366 chars]
